item.description:
Bev left a message on the Message Board inquiring if anyone would like to go see SLUMDOG MILLIONAIRE
and then go out for Chinese food as all good Jews do on Christmas day!

The movie is playing in Dedham and there's a 2:20 (bargain matinee) and a 4:40 showing.

The new Sean Penn movie MILK is also at the same theatre at 1:00 (bargain matinee) and 3:45

Where would we go for dinner - ???

Let's finalize plans at Panera on Sunday if we don't get snowed in!
item.name: Movie and Dinner
